name: MartintheTweeter
0:
”Alexa ask Martin the Tweeter what's new”
”Alexa ask Martin the Tweeter what he said”
”Alexa ask Martin the Tweeter to give me the latest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: martin the tweeter
des: Waiting for Winds of Winter to be announced? Looking forward to Game of Thrones? This is a simple way to find out what George R.R. Martin is up to. Martin the Tweeter will read to you the last 5 tweets our favorite author has published. No longer will you miss the announcements we're all waiting for.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
